_header: Honour of kings in every mans sight
Subjects: occasional verse; pageants; chronicles, verse in
_description: A ‘scripture’ or descriptive title in a London pageant — one couplet (in Gregory’s Chronicle)

BLEge1995.Transcription:
Honowre of kyngys in every mannys syghtOf comyn costome louythe
                    equyte and ryghte

                        ed.
